abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Fire Department journals span the period 1899 to 1904 and are housed in two bound volumes. The order journal includes of memoranda of fire chiefs, and the company journal includes specific time entries and departures of the firemen, as well as a time schedule of the house watchman for Engine Company No. 54.
